总结：

中国白话和简单的现代普通话之间存在一些差异。中国白话使用古语和书面语，而简单的现代普通话更接近日常口语。在转换过程中，需要保留一些古语和书面语的特色，同时用更通俗易懂的现代语言来表达。在本文中，我们将中国白话改写为简单的现代普通话，以更好地理解和阅读。

paragraphs.original: 王夫人听说，便欢喜非常。正想娘家人少，薛姨妈家又衰败了；兄弟又在外任，照应不著。今日忽听兄弟拜相回京，王家荣耀，将来宝玉都有倚靠。便把失玉的心又略放开些了，天天专望兄弟来京。

Her brothers were away from home and couldn't take care of the family. But today she heard that her brothers were returning to Beijing and the Wang family was now prosperous. paragraphs.original: 且说元春自选了凤藻宫后，圣眷隆重，身体发福，未免举动费力。每日起居劳乏，时发痰疾。因前日侍宴回宫，偶沾寒气、勾起旧病。不料此回甚属利害，竟至痰气壅塞，四肢厥冷。一面奏明，即召太医调治。岂知汤药不进，连用通关之剂，并不见效。内官忧虑，奏请预办后事，所以传旨命贾氏椒房进见。

He often felt tired after getting up and going to bed, and he often had a cough. The other day, after returning to the palace from the imperial banquet, he caught a cold and developed an old disease. This time, it was very serious. The phlegm was blocked and the limbs were cold. The eunuchs reported to the emperor that the emperor should send a doctor to treat it. The medicine was not taken, and the opening and closing medicine was not effective. The eunuchs were very worried and asked the emperor to prepare for his afterlife. Therefore, the order was issued to command the imperial family of the Jia clan to come to see him.

paragraphs.original: 贾母王夫人遵旨进宫，见元妃痰塞口涎，不能言语。见了贾母，只有悲泣之状，却没眼泪。贾母进前请安，奏些宽慰的话。少时，贾政等职名递进，宫嫔传奏，元妃目不能顾，渐渐脸色改变。内官太监即要奏闻，恐派各妃看视，椒房姻戚未便久羁，请在外宫伺候。贾母王夫人怎忍便离，无奈国家制度，只得下来。又不敢啼哭，惟有心内悲感。
paragraphs.english: Jia Mother and Wang Fei followed the imperial decree to enter the palace, and saw Yuan Xi's saliva clogging her mouth and unable to speak. When they saw Jia Mother, Yuan Xi only had a look of sorrow, but no tears. Jia Mother knelt down and offered her respects, and said some consoling words. Soon, the names of Jia Zheng and others were sent to the palace, and the palace eunuchs announced that Yuan Xi was unable to see, and her face was gradually changing. The imperial eunuchs wanted to report to the emperor, but they were afraid that if they sent the concubines to take care of her, the imperial relatives would not be able to stay long, so they asked them to wait outside the palace. Jia Mother and Wang Fei did not want to leave, but they had no choice but to leave, as the imperial regulations did not allow it. They dared not cry, but their hearts were filled with sorrow.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾母和王夫人遵照旨意进宫，看到元妃痰塞口涎，不能说话。看到贾母，元妃只有悲泣之状，却没眼泪。贾母上前请安，说了些宽慰的话。不久，贾政等人的名字被递进宫中，宫嫔传奏，元妃目不能视，脸色渐渐改变。内官太监想要奏闻，但担心派各妃子看护，椒房姻戚不便久留，让她们在外宫等待。贾母和王夫人舍不得离开，但无奈国家制度，只得离开。她们不敢啼哭，只有内心悲感。

Although she is very surprised to hear that Bao has lost his jade, she dares not ask, but can only listen to others talk about it. Only Lady Xue sends her maid to inquire about her several times. paragraphs.original: 过了些时，竟有人到荣府门上，口称送玉来的。家人们听见，喜欢的了不得，便说：“拿来，我给你回去。”那人便怀内掏出赏格来，指给门上的人瞧，说：“这不是你们府上的帖子？写明送玉的给银一万两。二太爷，你们这会子瞧我穷，回来我得了银子，就是财主了，别这么待理不理的！”门上人听他的话头儿硬，便说道：“你到底略给我瞧瞧，我好给你回。”那人初倒不肯，后来听人说得有理，便掏出那玉，托在掌中一扬，说：“这是不是？”众家人原是在外服役，只知有玉，也不常见；今日才看见这玉的模样儿了，急忙跑到里头抢头报的似的。
paragraphs.english: After a while, someone came to the gate of the Rong府, claiming to be delivering a jade. The family members heard this and were very happy, saying, "Bring it in, I'll give you a reward." The person then took out the reward list and pointed to the doorkeeper, saying, "Is this not your house's notice? It says that the person who delivers the jade will receive ten thousand taels of silver. Second Master, now you seem poor, but once I get the silver, I'll be rich, so don't treat me so coldly!" The doorkeeper heard his tone was firm and said, "Show me the jade, so I can give you an answer." At first, the person was unwilling, but after hearing the others' reasoning, he took out the jade and held it in his palm, saying, "Is this not the jade?" The servants who were serving outside had only heard of the jade, but had never seen it before; today they finally saw its appearance. They rushed in, shouting like they were reporting something important.

paragraphs.english: On that day, Jia Zheng and Jia Pi went out, and only Jia Lian was at home. The others told him and he asked if it was true. The gatekeeper said he had seen it with his own eyes, but he wanted to see the owner, and a silver coin for a jade. Jia Lian was very happy and immediately told Wang Fei and reported it to Jia Mo. Xi Ren heard it and was very happy. Jia Mo didn't change his mind and said in a loud and repeated voice, "Call Jia Lian to ask that person to sit in the study, take the jade to see, and give him a silver coin." Jia Lian followed suit, invited that person in, treated him like a guest, and expressed gratitude in good words: "If you borrow this jade and let the owner see it, we won't give you a silver coin."
paragraphs.chinese: 那日，贾政和贾赦出门了，只有贾琏在家。众人告诉他，他问真不真。门上的人说他亲眼见过，但不要奴才，要见主人，一手交钱，一手交玉。贾琏很喜欢，马上告诉王夫人，并向贾母汇报，袭人听了很高兴。贾母不改变口，一叠连声地说：“快叫琏儿请那个人到书房里坐，把玉拿来看一看，就把钱给那个人。”贾琏照办，请那个人进来，像客人一样对待他，用好话感谢他：“要借这玉送到里头本人见了，谢银一分一厘都不短。”

paragraphs.original: 那人只得将一个红绸子包儿送过去。贾琏打开一看，可不是那一块晶莹美玉吗？贾琏素昔原不理论，今日倒要看看。看了半日，上面的字也仿佛认得出来，什么“除邪祟”等字。贾琏看了，喜之不胜，便叫家人伺候，忙忙的送与贾母王夫人认去。

paragraphs.english: Now the whole family is waiting to see the excitement. When the Jialin came in, Fengzheng took the jade and didn't dare to look at it first. He passed it to the Jialin's hands. Jialin laughed and said, "You have a little bit of a thing, and you don't call me to show my merits." Jialin opened it and saw that the jade was much darker than before. Quanyang took the eyeglasses to look at it and said, "It's strange! This jade is indeed the one! How did the head's precious color disappear?" Wangfeng looked at it for a while and didn't recognize it. Then he called Fengzheng to look at it. Fengzheng looked at it and said, "It looks like it, but the color is not right. Let's let the young master look at it himself and know." Xisi was beside him, but he couldn't say it was not like it because he was too eager to see it.
paragraphs.chinese: 这会子惊动了全家的人都等着看热闹。凤姐看见贾琏进来，就把玉抢过去，不敢先看，递到贾母手里。贾琏笑道：“你这么点儿事，还不叫我来献功呢！”贾母打开一看，只见那玉比先前暗淡了许多。鸳鸯拿上眼镜儿来看，说：“奇怪！这块玉倒是的！怎么把头里的宝色都没了呢？”王夫人看了一会子，也认不出，便叫凤姐过来看。凤姐看了看，说：“像倒是像，只是颜色不大对，不如让宝兄弟自己看一眼，就知道了。”袭人在旁边，也觉得未必是那块玉，只是盼得的心盛，也不敢说不像。

paragraphs.original: 凤姐于是从贾母手中接过来，同著袭人，拿来给宝玉瞧。这时宝玉正睡著才醒。凤姐告诉道：“你的玉有了。”宝玉睡眼朦胧，接在手里也没瞧，便往地下一撂，道：“你们又来哄我了！”说著，只是冷笑。凤姐连忙拾起来道：“这也就奇了，怎么你没瞧，就知道呢？”宝玉也不答言，只管笑。王夫人也进屋里来了，见他这样，便道：“这不用说了。他那玉原是胎里带来的一宗古怪东西，自然他有道理。想来这个必是人家见了帖儿照样儿做的。”大家此时恍然大悟。
paragraphs.english: Feng Jie took the jade from Jia Mu and handed it over to Xisi. Baoyu was just about to fall asleep when he woke up and Feng Jie said, "Your jade is here." Baoyu was half-asleep and took it from her, but immediately threw it on the ground, saying, "You're trying to trick me again!" He then just laughed. Feng Jie quickly picked it up and asked, "What's wrong with that? Can't you just look at it?" Baoyu didn't say anything and just continued to laugh. Wang Fu also came in and saw the situation, saying, "Never mind, his jade is a strange thing from his birth. He must have his own reasons. This must be someone who saw the invitation and copied it." Everyone then understood.
paragraphs.chinese: 凤姐从贾母手中接过玉，和袭人一起给宝玉看。宝玉正要睡着，醒来后，凤姐说：“你的玉有了。”宝玉迷迷糊糊地接过来，却直接扔在地上，说：“你们又来骗我了！”说完只是冷笑。凤姐连忙捡起来，问：“这怎么了？你不看就知道？”宝玉也不说话，继续笑。王夫人也进来了，看到这种情况，就说：“不用说了，他的玉是胎里带来的怪东西，他肯定有道理。想来这个也是人家见了帖儿照着做的。”大家这才明白过来。

paragraphs.english: Jialin heard this in the outer room and said, "If it's true, bring it here for me to question him. People who do such things would dare to come and fish in troubled waters!" Jialin's mother stopped him and said, "Jialin, take this jade to him and let him go. That person is in a desperate situation, so he might try to make some money by taking advantage of our situation. Now that he's spent his money on this thing and we've recognized it, I think it's best not to make things difficult for him. Give him back the jade, saying it's not ours, and give him a few silver coins. Then he'll be more likely to come back with the real thing if he knows we're not going to be hard on him. If we make things difficult for him, even if it's true, he won't come back." Jialin agreed to go out. The person was still waiting. After a while, when Jialin came out fuming, the person felt a little nervous.
